column4: Okay, how is it that I repeatedly feel like an idiot when trying anything... how do I flash my bios? Using Google repeatedly returns that I need a floppy drive... who the hell has a floppy drive these days?!? Ô_ô;
Does the procedure depend on manufacturer, or is there some common tool to do it?
what are you trying to do , first of all ?
were jujst trying change the boot sequence or ?
